Calls have intensified for a change to the handball law after Fulham were denied an equalising goal in a 1-0 loss to Tottenham. 
Mario Lemina was blameless for the disallowed goal when Davinson Sanc… [+1754 chars]

articles.title: Mounting misery - Chelsea inflict historic defeat on Liverpool - The World Game
articles.description: Mason Mount scored the only goal of the game as Chelsea moved up to fourth in the Premier League by consigning Liverpool to a fifth consecutive home defeat for the first time in their history.
articles.content: Mount finished superbly in the first half to seal a 1-0 win and extend the Blues' unbeaten run to 10 matches under Thomas Tuchel, who came out on top in the battle of the two former Borussia Dortmund… [+1821 chars]

articles.title: Manchester United have made 'clear' progress under Solskjaer - Woodward - ESPN
articles.description: Ed Woodward says the progress Manchester United have made under Ole Gunnar Solskjaer "is clear."
articles.content:
Ed Woodward says the progress Manchester United have made under Ole Gunnar Solskjaer "is clear."
